Description: To carry out Planned, Reactive & Corrective Maintenance Task. Ensure tasks are completed within the required response time based on priorities. Execute PPM tasks as per the schedules and frequencies. Submit the daily reports to the supervisor. Monitor spare parts, tools and equipment required to execute the maintenance work. Communicate with supervisors in case of major breakdown or Emergency tasks. Follow the safety regulations and procedures while performing the maintenance workSkills
Skills: Two years Diploma or ITI in HVAC. Knowledge of HVAC reactive and PPM
maintenance for the (FAHU,AHU, FCU, DX units). Knowledge of CAFM system,
KPI & SLA. Good reporting skills. Gulf Region experience preferred.
